title: Gemini Code Assist vs. Copilot: The Rise of AI Coding Agents
author: Richard MacManus
description: We talk to Google about the latest iteration of Gemini Code Assist — including its embrace of agents and how it differs from GitHub Copilot.
cntitle: Gemini Code Assist 与 Copilot：AI 编码助手的崛起
cndescription: 我们与 Google 讨论了 Gemini Code Assist 的最新迭代版本，包括它对代理的采用以及它与 GitHub Copilot 的不同之处。
